function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Association between green view and psychological health outcomes","Impact":"Failure to consider the impact of green view on psychological health outcomes may lead to neglecting an important factor in disease transmission and containment.","Mitigation":"Conduct further research to understand the relationship between green views and disease transmission. Implement measures to promote green spaces in built environments to support public health.","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, remote sensing, and urban planning tools can be used to identify areas for green space implementation.","People":"Residents, urban planners, public health officials","Owner":"Public health agencies, urban planning organizations"},{"Description":"Sensitivity analysis on COVID-19 cases and green features","Impact":"Neglecting the impact of COVID-19 cases on the association between green features and psychological health outcomes may lead to incomplete understanding of the risk factors for disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Conduct a comprehensive analysis of the interplay between green features, psychological health, and disease transmission. Incorporate COVID-19 case data into public health and urban planning strategies.","Technologies":"Data analytics, statistical modeling, and public health surveillance tools can aid in analyzing the relationship between green features and COVID-19 cases.","People":"Epidemiologists, public health researchers, urban planners","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Effect modification by the Current Working Mode","Impact":"Failure to consider the impact of working mode on the relationship between green features and psychological health outcomes may lead to misinterpretation of the findings and ineffective public health interventions.","Mitigation":"Conduct additional research to assess the influence of working mode on the association between green features and psychological health outcomes. Develop tailored public health interventions based on the findings.","Technologies":"Survey and questionnaire tools, statistical analysis software, and public health research methods can be used to investigate the influence of working mode on health outcomes.","People":"Employers, public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Public health agencies, employers"}]}
